characters.Name: Tracy
characters.Description: She is a middle-aged, American woman. She is a professional lawyer.

characters.Name: Hulk
characters.Description: He is a mutant. He was exposed to radiation and now he is a large, partial human of a creature.

plot: Hulk is a simple minded mutant who think he is the victim.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: You caused a lot of damage with that gas leak. People's lives and homes were destroyed, and they deserve justice.

dialogue.Speaker: Hulk
dialogue.Text: Me mad. Me just trying to survive. Didn't mean to hurt anyone.

dialogue.Speaker: Tracy
dialogue.Text: Survival is not an excuse for causing harm to innocent people. You need to take responsibility for your actions and compensate the victims.
